title: Basshunter - The Album
description:
BASSHUNTER - NOW YOU&#039;RE GONE: THE ALBUM [2008], album released UK July 14th 2008.
Encoded 320Kbps [Lame] mp3. Covers included.

Basshunter aka Jonas Altberg was born 1984 in Halmstad, Sweden. He lives with his parents and younger brother 5 minutes from Swedens best beach "Tylosand". He can shortly be described as a stubborn and creative person. He started to produce music in 1999 with a little help from the computer program "Fruityloops". His interest in music became bigger and bigger. After a lot of demos spread over the internet, he started to get phone calls from clubs that wanted to hire him as deejay. In April 2006 he got his first real contact with the music industry when he signed a record deal with Warner Music. He released his first single &#039;Boten Anna&#039; in Scandinavia and it became an instant hit. It all happened very fast, much faster then Basshunter himself could ever have expected.

&#039;Now You&#039;re Gone: The Album&#039;, is an album released by Swedish eurodance musician Basshunter on July 14th 2008. The album features English remakes of older Basshunter hits.

Tracks:
01  Now You&#039;re Gone  
02  All I Ever Wanted  
03  Please Don&#039;t Go  
04  I Miss You  
05  Angel In The Night  
06  In Her Eyes  
07  Love You More

09  Dream Girl  
10  I Can Walk On Water  
11  Bass Creator  
12  Russia Privjet
